name: deck.gl
description: A suite of 3D-enabled data visualization overlays, suitable for react-map-gl

scripts.build: npm run build-dist && npm run build-script
scripts.build-dist: npm run build-clean && npm run build-src && npm run build-shaderlib
scripts.build-script: browserify src/bundle.js -t babelify -t glslify | uglifyjs > dist/deckgl.min.js
scripts.build-watch: npm run build-clean && npm run build-src-watch && npm run build-shaderlib-watch
scripts.demo-start: budo demo/src/javascripts/main.js:main.min.js --dir demo/src/static/ --open --  -t sassify -t babelify -t glslify
scripts.demo-build: npm run demo-build-clean && npm run demo-build-copy && npm run demo-build-script
scripts.demo-build-clean: test -d demo/dist || mkdir -p demo/dist && rm -fr demo/dist/*
scripts.demo-build-script: NODE_ENV=production browserify demo/src/javascripts/main.js -o -t sassify -t babelify -t glslify | uglifyjs > demo/dist/main.min.js
scripts.mypublish: npm run build && npm run test-fast && npm publish
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build-dist && npm run test-headless
scripts.test-fast: npm run lint && npm run test-headless
scripts.test-shader: npm run build-dist && budo src/test/shader.js:build/test-bundle.js --dir test --live --open --port 3001 --watch-glob '**/*.{html,css,scss,js,glsl}' -- -t babelify -t glslify
scripts.profile-disc: browserify src/bundle.js --full-paths -t babelify -t glslify | uglifyjs | discify --open
scripts.start: npm run build-watch && budo example/main.js:example/bundle.js --live --open --port 3000 --css example/main.css --title 'deck.gl' --watch-glob '**/*.{html,css,js,glsl}' -- -t babelify -t envify
